name: Touch the Hologram
description:
“I want to be with you for a while longer”

whether in humans, ghosts or holograms
Losing you is like I lost a piece of my life.
I became a psycho introverted into a stupid laboratory. Connected a freak circuit that I took years to learn and differentiate what it was.

when I'm tired I want to receive a hug from you
want to hear your voice That made me work even harder.
and when i finished building the hologram, I met you

“I’m here….so don’t cry my love”
That's the first sentence you said to me. Even if it sounds unnatural But that brought me to tears. It's been a really long time without you And it's been a long time since I've been waiting here

I won't let you go again
we will be together As long as technology exists on this planet
It might be in the next 10 years, 20 years, or until I can travel through time to meet you at the house of the Lord...

I will love you always...and forever.
